v_etoi_chasti_vy_stanete_zoomagazinom_u_: In this part, you will become a pet shop. You will have many competitors; monitor their prices so that you do not lose.
nam_nado_kupit_kotyat_u_pitomnikov_zatem: We need to buy kittens from catteries and then sell the kittens to the city at a higher price so that catteries sell their pets to you and not to another player. Buy kittens at a higher price than other pet shops, but do not set your price above the city price. Click the kitten.
ty_mozhesh_pokupat_ikh_dorozhe_ili_po_ta: You may buy them at a higher price or at the same price, but your price must not be higher than
po_takoi_tsene_ty_prodash_kotyat_gorodu_: At this price, you will sell the kittens to the city — that is your profit. Set this price for your kitten:
teper_nazhmi_knopku_sokhranit_chtoby_pit: Now click the «SAVE» button so that the catteries see your new price.
tvoya_tsena_na_kotenka_ponravilas_pitomn: Your price for the kitten was accepted by the cattery. Click the envelope.
chtoby_prodat_kotyat_gorodu_peretashchi_: To sell the kittens to the city, drag all your pets into the city zone.
tseny_igrayut_bolshuyu_rol_v_nashem_dele: Prices play a major role in our business. While focusing on the client, do not forget about competitors. To complete the practical task, look at how we calculated it.
uznai_tseny_magazina_konkurenta_i_ustano: Find out the prices of a competing shop and set favorable prices for catteries to buy their kittens. Then sell the kittens to the city, taking into account the prices of competitors and the city. The time to complete the task is limited.
dobro_pozhalovat_v_glavu_tsenovaya_polit: WELCOME TO THE CHAPTER «PRICING POLICY: PET SHOP»
glava_tsenovaya_politika_zoomagazin_prak: CHAPTER «PRICING POLICY: PET SHOP» PRACTICAL TASK
